review_details: a wonderful experience - small boat for maximum 12 passengers, ideal for private travel,the 2 Andreas that make up the crew were wonderful - extremely friendly and helpful - they managed to make us a beautiful day - lunch was fished in front of us , they gave us more time where we wished even if that meant going beyond their program. & thanks Poseideon team!
The food was very good ( traditional food and international)and the place has a spectacular view from terrace.The waiter was helpfull and the service very good.
